item.title: WPC Announces Qi2 25W Wireless Charging With iPhone Support
item.description: Qi2 25W wireless charging has been officially announced by the Wireless Power Consortium (WPC), confirming its coming support for compatible iPhones. Qi2 was previously known only by its version numbe
